sentences.en: A small round granule of extraterrestrial origin found embedded in some meteorites.
sentences.cn: 一些陨石中发现的细小微粒(如贵橄榄石微粒).

sentences.en: Aim To study antitussive, expectorant and antiasthmatic effects of Qingfeixiaoke granule.
sentences.cn: 目的研究清肺消咳颗粒镇咳 、 祛痰、平喘的药理作用.

sentences.en: Applied to valve k pump, granule pump and coal slurry pump.
sentences.cn: 泵、煤浆泵 、 污水泵等含杂质颗粒介质的设备.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Xinqin granule do have the antagonism to histamine.
sentences.cn: 结论: 辛芩颗粒对过敏性介质组织胺有确定的对抗作用.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Zehaung Granule has a good effect on the disease above.
sentences.cn: 结论: “泽黄颗粒”对该病有良好的治疗效果.

sentences.en: In human epithelial cells, sex chromatin appears as a small granule attached to the nuclear envelope.
sentences.cn: 在人的上皮细胞中, 性染色质象个小颗粒,连在核膜上.

sentences.en: Microscopists can identify the source of starch by examination of granule shape and arrangement.
sentences.cn: 通过显微镜观察按颗粒形状和排列方式可确定淀粉的来源.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the effect of Zidian granule in treating allergic purpura.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察紫癜颗粒治疗过敏性紫癜的临床疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To develop a RP - HPLC method to determine adenosine in Chongcaoqizhi granule.
sentences.cn: 目的建立一种 反相 高效液相色谱法测定虫草杞芝颗粒中腺苷含量的方法.

sentences.en: Objective To establish the optimal extracting process of the Lizhongtang compatible granule.
sentences.cn: 目的优选理中汤配方颗粒的提取工艺.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo investigate the anti - oxide free radical effect of XinAn Granule ( XAG ).
sentences.cn: 目的研究心安颗粒有无 抗氧 自由基的作用.

sentences.en: Properties: Yellow granule, sweet. The water solution is suspension.
sentences.cn: 性状: 本品为黄色颗粒, 味甘, 溶于水后为混悬液.

sentences.en: Small in granule, quickly solidified no powder and less volatile.
sentences.cn: 颗粒小, 固化快,极少挥发气体和产生粉尘.

sentences.en: The surface rarely shows such features as wind ripples or wind granule ripples.
sentences.cn: 表面上很少显示出风成沙波纹或风成细砾波纹.

sentences.en: To evaluate the acute and chronic toxicity of ganshu granule.
sentences.cn: 考察肝疏冲剂的急性毒性和长期毒性,评价其用药的安全性.
